title: I can't make or join club

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: My account is about 2 days old and the club button is greyed out. When can i use club?

replies.body: That's odd, I'm not seeing anything that would prevent you from joining clubs.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll take a look into this directly with you to see what happened.
same thing is happening with me, Clubs button is grayed out
